SettingsView.pageDescription: Decide where Mnemos runs heavy AI workloads and how often you hear about local indexing hiccups.

summaries.title: Summaries
summaries.description: Choose whether to summarize notes locally, remotely, or with an automatic fallback.
summaries.label: Summaries run on

localOnly.label: Local only
localOnly.description: Run the Phi-3.5 summarizer entirely on this device.

allowFallback.label: Allow fallback
allowFallback.description: Try the local worker first, then call the cloud helper if it fails.

serverOnly.label: Server only
serverOnly.description: Always send summaries to Mnemos' server action (requires internet).

embeddings.title: Embeddings
embeddings.description: Control how Mnemos indexes notes for semantic search and when to fall back to the cloud.
embeddings.label: Embeddings run on

localOnly.label: Local only
localOnly.description: Derive embeddings with the on-device transformer.

allowFallback.label: Allow fallback
allowFallback.description: Retry in the cloud when the local worker errors or times out.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Mute local indexing error toasts once you are confident in your setup.
notifications.toggleDescription: Prevent Mnemos from showing fallback prompts when embeddings fail.
